long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Watch Later Organizer - Your Smart Video Library Manager

Transform your YouTube Watch Later playlist into an organized, searchable library! This extension automatically categorizes your saved videos into topics, making it easier than ever to find and watch the content you've saved.

üéØ Key Features:
- Smart Topic Detection: Videos are automatically categorized into topics like Tech, Education, Entertainment, and more
- Powerful Search: Quickly find videos by title, channel, or topic
- Dual View Options: Switch between Grid and List views to browse your way
- Real-time Updates: Syncs automatically with your Watch Later playlist
- No Setup Required: Works instantly after installation
- Privacy-Focused: All processing happens locally in your browser

‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT NOTE:
For best results, please follow these steps:
1. Open your YouTube Watch Later playlist
2. Scroll down to the bottom of the playlist until all videos are loaded
3. Then click the extension icon
This ensures all your videos are properly organized and categorized.

Perfect for:
‚úì Content creators collecting inspiration
‚úì Students organizing educational content
‚úì Tech enthusiasts managing tutorials
‚úì Anyone with a growing Watch Later list

Why You'll Love It:
- Save Time: No more endless scrolling to find that one video
- Stay Organized: Your videos are automatically sorted into relevant topics
- User-Friendly: Clean, intuitive interface with dark mode
- Zero Configuration: Install and start using immediately
- Performance: Lightweight and fast, doesn't slow down your browsing

How It Works:
1. Install the extension
2. Open your YouTube Watch Later playlist
3. Scroll to load all videos
4. Click the extension icon
5. Browse your videos organized by topics!

Free Forever, No Account Required!

Note: This extension requires access to youtube.com to organize your Watch Later playlist. All processing happens locally in your browser - we don't collect any data.
